definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Talent never goes unrecognized, through constant endeavour will it be seen.
sentences.chinese: 世上没有怀才不遇，只看你是否百分百争取。

sentences.english: Also you do not have to use true camel in order to bring your outfits to life.
sentences.chinese: 你也不必拘泥于百分百的驼色来为服装添彩。
孙燕姿在娱乐百分百的新闻。

sentences.english: So I was a 100% sure that this was the school for me.
sentences.chinese: 所以我百分百肯定就是它了。

sentences.english: Try oats with raisins, or barley with 100-percent fruit spread.
sentences.chinese: 尝试用燕麦加上葡萄干，或者百分百纯果酱自制早餐。

sentences.english: This hydraulic system is 100 per cent made in China, " says Wang proudly.
sentences.chinese: “这台液压系统百分百产自中国，”王天亮骄傲地说。

sentences.english: So 2/10 of a percent, 2/10 would be the move here.
sentences.chinese: 所以这里的移动量就是，一个百分百的。

sentences.english: Better reputation, innovation, excellence, to achieve hundred percent pass rate.
sentences.chinese: 更佳的信誉，创新，创优，实现出厂合格率百分百。

sentences.english: But the wheel is one hundred percent homo sapien innovation.
sentences.chinese: 但轮子却百分百属于智人的发明。

sentences.english: Apart from its 10-out-of-10 rating on the Legendary Clich scale, this sentence makes no sense.
sentences.chinese: 除了是百分百的陈词滥调外，这句话没有一点意义。

sentences.english: It is made from 100% whey protein which has been partially hydrolysed .
sentences.chinese: 它是由百分百的为植物蛋白的乳清蛋白组成。

sentences.english: We are committed to achieve full customer satisfaction through quality assurance of our defect-free products.
sentences.chinese: 我们坚持以百分百良率的质量保证来满足客户。

sentences.english: I’m hundred-percent positive he sells the stolen flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我百分百肯定他卖那些偷来的花。

sentences.english: E endorses product, no matter where they go they are loved by many.
sentences.chinese: 跨足帮产品代言，不管到哪里，讨喜程度总是百分百。

sentences.english: For you and your family create a hundred percent healthy kitchen and new space.
sentences.chinese: 为您和您的家人创造百分百的键康厨卫新空间。
这件衬衫百分百是棉制的。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
